did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: First Universalist Church of Bristol records, 1833-1927.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: First Universalist Church of Bristol (Bristol, N.Y.)

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Unbound manuscript sheets of trustee meeting minutes (1833, 1834); one volume of quarterly church meeting and annual meeting minutes (1872-1927); and one volume containing records of baptisms, marriages, deaths and funerals, admissions, and christenings, including a list of members (1869-1903).
